attributes.action: Stop new TESCO store in Harrogate.
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to raise the governments awareness of the lack of local public support for the proposed Tesco Supermarket on the site of the old gasworks on Skipton Road.WE NEED THE GOVERNMENT TO INTERVENE ON THE BEHALF OF THE RESIDENTS OF HARROGATE AND PUT A STOP TO THIS TOTALLY UNNECESSARY DEVELOPMENT.
Surely the way forward would be to ballot the residents of Harrogate and actually ask them what THEY want not what TESCO wants?
